Chemical-free water treatment with ozone The water treatment with ozone is currently the market leading system for a chemical-free water treatment. In a reactor, ozone reacts with organic and chemical constituents of the bath water and oxidizes them into a filterable matter.

The treatment of wastewater is a complex process of caring for the precious resource of water and avoid environmental pollution by a large amount of wastewater. Optimally designed processes ensure efficient cleaning of waste water and save money.
